name: pow
description: Returns the result of raising i1 to the power of i2. In the event of an overflow, throws a runtime error. Note: Corner cases are handled with the following rules: if both `i1` and `i2` are `0`, return `1` if i1 is 1, return 1 if `i1` is `0`, return `0` if i2 is 1, return i1 * if i2 is negative or greater than u32::MAX, throw a runtime error
